review: I am not able to get this stick to work. I also received a "Chromecast" that works fine.
author: Judith Cole

review: Once I figured out how to get on Netflix., I am a happy camper.  Very pleased with it.
author: Rosetta

review: My daughters and husband got me this for my Birthday.  It's easy to use.
author: Lucy Martin

review: After purchase, I found out that router must be 15' from Fire Stick...not always easily done.  Tech support gave me a couple work-arounds but still occasional problems.  Never a problem like this with Chromecast.
author: Bill Lindenschmidt

review: Its great easy convenient. Customer friendly.
author: N L R Knox

review: Everything worked just as I expected.  Thanks
author: Herbert G. Stevens Sr.

review: So easy to use! We love it.
author: Queen T

review: Has a ton of features and apps. All for a great price compared to Apple tv or other devices. Also a downloadable app to stream videos from your phone to your tv. Would definitely buy again
author: Andrew
